page.title: 09TOURISM CARAVANING
page.content: AT SLENINGFORD WATERMILL THERE ARE MANY FACILITIES FOR THE COMFORTS OF PEOPLE WHO STAY FOR HOLIDAYS.THEY HAVE A TELEPHONE BOX;A LAUNDRY WITH SINKS,TUMBLER DRIERS AND WASHING MACHINES;A GAS HOUSE WHERE PEOPLE CAN BUY CALOR GAS AND CAMPING GAZ.THERE ARE TOILETS AND SHOWERS FOR NORMAL AND DISABLED PEOPLE,AND CHANGING FACILITIES FOR CANOISTS.IN THE RECREATIONAL ROOM THERE IS A TABLE TENNIS WHICH IS HIRED OUT BY THE HALF HOUR.OUTSIDE IS A HOPSCOTCH,A LARGE DRAUGHTS BOARD(THE SQUARES ARE ABOUT 40CM.),A SAND PIT AND BEHIND THE HOUSE IS A CLIMBING FRAME FOR CHILDREN.AROUND THE SITE ARE WASTE DISPOSAL POINTS,DUSTBINS, TAPS AND FIRE ALARM POINTS.AS PART OF THE RECEPTION AREA THERE IS A SHOP WHICH SELLS ALL THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE CAMPERS.
